name: Convergence Series 7: Drawing in Progress 1
description: Drawing a Voronoi tessellation beginning with my version of Delaunay triangulation, in order to guide flow lines across the picture plane in a dynamic composition that can extract color from images in transformative and endlessly interesting re-imaginings // 4835 x 4835 png drawn in adobe illustrator by @clintfulkerson clint.tez clintart.eth
